---

# Sources that you need to study

## Tooling

- [OpenAPI Generator](https://openapi-generator.tech/docs/installation) for understanding how OpenAPI code generation works
- [Go](https://go.dev/doc/) for project structure and module management
- [Effective Go](https://go.dev/doc/effective_go) for writing idiomatic Go code
- [Go styleguide](https://google.github.io/styleguide/go/) for coding conventions and best practices in Go by google
- [OpenAPI](https://swagger.io/specification/) for API documentation and design
- [Bun](https://bun.sh/docs) for JavaScript runtime and package management
- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/docs/) for JavaScript runtime
- [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/) for static typing in JavaScript
- [Fetch API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Fetch_API)
- [Release Please](https://github.com/googleapis/release-please) for automating releases
